name: BDef
summary: Defend your base from marauding bots in this tower defense strategy.

name: B.D.K
summary: B.D.K is a short experimental first person horror game that mainly relies on atmosphere and sounds to create a creepy experience.

name: BDEF: Base Defenders
summary: Plan your defense tower placement wisely so as to guide the enemy bots through a path that will ensure they spend as much time as possible within the effective ranges of your defensive towers.

name: B-Daman
summary:
Immerse yourself in the dynamic and thrilling universe of B-Daman Crossfire, your destination for intense marble-blasting combat. This game places you in the midst of the action where skill in maneuvering and strategy will determine your success on the journey to becoming the ultimate champion.

In the world of marble shooters, you are introduced to an expansive selection of 12 distinct figures, each with unique capabilities. The game offers an exceptional degree of personalization, allowing you to customize your figure down to the finest detail. Choose from an impressive array of over 40 different parts, accessories, and colors to enhance its performance and create a hero that truly reflects your personal style.

name: BDSM Fuel Station: Interactive Physics Simulation
summary: This is a game that utilizes real physics simulation, where the protagonist interacts with props in the scene through a physics simulation engine. Therefore, every time you play, it offers you a different experience.

name: BDSM Clicker
